thread:
Researchers introduce SuperBPE, a new tokenizer blending subword and superword tokens for enhanced text efficiency 🧠🚀 #NLP #AI
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.13423
A new tokenizer evolves through two phases: subwords and superwords 🧠💡 #NLP #LanguageModel
Drum roll 🥁 SuperBPE excels in encoding efficiency, outperforming traditional BPE. #AIAdvancements #LanguageModeling
Drum roll 🥁 The #AIIndex2025 shows 0% avg gain vs BPE. 🔧 #AIResearch
